title: use of deprecated item 'std::sync::atomic::ATOMIC_BOOL_INIT'
body:
from crater run: 

```
[INFO] [stderr]    Compiling lazy_static v1.2.0 (/opt/crater/workdir)
[INFO] [stderr] warning: use of deprecated item 'std::sync::atomic::ATOMIC_BOOL_INIT': the `new` function is now preferred
[INFO] [stderr]    --> tests/test.rs:136:5
[INFO] [stderr]     |
[INFO] [stderr] 136 | use std::sync::atomic::ATOMIC_BOOL_INIT;
[INFO] [stderr]     |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
[INFO] [stderr]     |
[INFO] [stderr]     = note: #[warn(deprecated)] on by default
[INFO] [stderr] 
[INFO] [stderr] warning: use of deprecated item 'std::sync::atomic::ATOMIC_BOOL_INIT': the `new` function is now preferred
[INFO] [stderr]    --> tests/test.rs:139:36
[INFO] [stderr]     |
[INFO] [stderr] 139 | static PRE_INIT_FLAG: AtomicBool = ATOMIC_BOOL_INIT;
[INFO] [stderr]     |                                    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
[INFO] [stderr] help: use of deprecated item 'std::sync::atomic::ATOMIC_BOOL_INIT': the `new` function is now preferred
[INFO] [stderr]     |
[INFO] [stderr] 139 | static PRE_INIT_FLAG: AtomicBool = AtomicBool::new(false);
[INFO] [stderr]     |                                    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
[INFO] [stderr] 
```

crates affected:
[lazy-static](https://crates.io/crates/lazy_static/1.2.0) - [crater log](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.34-1/beta-2019-02-27/reg/lazy_static-1.2.0/log.txt) 

@rust-lang-nursery
